item.title: Impressum
item.description: This is were I drop snippets and small insights that do not fit any other format; too trivial for a blog post but too long or too structured for Twitter and the like. Also, this is a playground for tech I wanted to pick up: AsciiDoc, Hugo, and GitHub actions. Obviously. Other forms of content end up on: @OmegaPolice on Twitter, for commentary and trivialities,
